entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Design a more general test hook solution for runtime feature flags #63223
    17.4
  • Review usage of `CopyWithoutSharingCachedSymbols()` in ref field tests #63222
    17.4
  • CompoundAssignment.Bug1021941 fail in .net7p6 #63221
  • Configure code style does nothing, does not apply to editorconfig #63216
  • "Enter Outlining mode when opening files" shouldn't apply when peeking definitions #63215
  • "Show potential fixes" is recommending a syntax error when doing a null check in VB.NET #63214
  • 2 BUGS in Visual Studio Community 2022 Preview Code Cleanup #63213
  • Semantic Snippets - Completion list filtering #63211
    17.4 P2
  • Update `SymbolDisplay` to include `scoped` for parameters and locals #63208
  • Duplicate analyzer diagnostics from CompilationWithAnalyzers #63205
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException from InlineHintsTagger.GetTags #63204
  • CompilationAndGeneratorDriverTranslationAction throws FileNotFoundException during clean #63203

Closed

  • Renamer.RenameSymbolAsync problem #63202

PullRequests

Created

  • Enc checksum alg #63219
    Area-IDE
  • Todo settings #63218
    Area-IDE
  • Additional filter texts #63217
    Area-IDE
  • [test only] #63212
    Area-IDE
  • Consider types with ref fields as managed #63209
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix analyzer action state tracking for partial analysis #63206
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Potential fix for rename hang in CI #63197
    Area-IDE
  • Original type attr vb #63194
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63220
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63200
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #62854 from CyrusNajmabadi/renameOOP5" #63196
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Handle scenario where initial completion list contains only a single non-roslyn item #63083
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63210
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #63201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63199
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "When we're removing the last project, fire SolutionRemoved" #63161
    Area-Analyzers, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.4 P1
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63191
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #63193
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move "generic attributes" feature into C# 11 #62952
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Skip rethrow #63179
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63192
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Rename `LifetimeAnnotationAttribute` to `ScopedRefAttribute` and simplify (#63009)" #63185
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
  • Hovering in .editorconfig files #63188
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Structural Error Cases for Lambda Default Parameters #62958
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref fields feature requires ByRefFields runtime flag #62941
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Upgrade to .NET 7 P6 SDK #63062
    Area-Infrastructure
  • New hot reload interfaces #60219
    Area-Interactive
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Convert to record #62999
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Enable source build for ASP.NET external access project #62956
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Create CLaSP Framework surface area #63149
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid resolving parameter.Type in ReportParameterErrors() #63142
    Area-Compilers
  • `ref` parameters to `ref struct` types should be `scoped ref` by default #62778
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Remove one of our out of proc analyzers #63180
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for incremental analysis for method body editing scenario… #63130
    Area-Analyzers
  • correctness build optimizations #62797
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move DesignerAttribute scanning off of SolutionCrawler #63190
    Area-IDE
  • Emit MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute #63169
    Area-Compilers, 17.4
